statements: SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE student_id = 100;
SELECT course_id, enrollment_status FROM Courses WHERE completion_status = 'Completed';
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_status FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE enrollment_status = 'Enrolled' AND completion_status = 'Not Completed';
SELECT course_id, student_id FROM Courses WHERE student_id > 200 ORDER BY student_id ASC, course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM Courses WHERE enrollment_status = 'Enrolled'
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE completion_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) as num_courses FROM Courses GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_courses > 1
SELECT student_id, enrollment_status, completion_status FROM Courses WHERE enrollment_status = 'Enrolled' AND completion_status = 'Incomplete' LIMIT 5
SELECT course_id, COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) as num_students FROM Courses WHERE completion_status = 'Completed' GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY num_students DESC
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, enrollment_status FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id FROM Students WHERE completion_status='completed';
SELECT course_id, course_name, enrollment_status FROM Courses WHERE enrollment_status IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT course_id, course_name, enrollment_status FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id > 100 ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE completion_status = 'completed'
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Courses WHERE enrollment_status IS NULL
SELECT student_name, completion_status FROM Students WHERE course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM Courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Programming%')
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM Students WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT course_name, course_enrollment_status FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_major FROM Students WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_major FROM Students WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, course_enrollment_status FROM Courses WHERE course_enrollment_status = 'Open' ORDER BY course_name;

SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id ORDER BY Students.student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, enrollment_status FROM Courses WHERE enrollment_status='Active';
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id=1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, enrollment_date FROM Enrollment INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollment.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Courses
SELECT course_name, enrollment_status FROM Courses
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students
SELECT course_name, enrollment_status, completion_status FROM Courses
SELECT student_name, student_email, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollment ON Students.student_id = Enrollment.student_id
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, enrollment_status FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, completion_status FROM Courses WHERE completion_status = 'Incomplete';
SELECT course_name, enrollment_status FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE enrollment_status = 'Enrolled';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, enrollment_status FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT enrollment_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments JOIN Students ON Enrollments.student_id = Students.student_id WHERE Students.student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT Courses.course_name, Progress.progress_percentage FROM Courses JOIN Progress ON Courses.course_id = Progress.course_id WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
